tool_description:
NetLicensing is a first-class solution in the Licensing as a Service (LaaS) sector.

Based on open standards, it provides a cost effective, integrated and scalable platform for software vendors and developers who want to concentrate on their product's core functionality instead of spending resources on developing an own license management software.
NetLicensing allows vendors and developers to enable license management for their new or existing products right away and with minimum effort.
name: Labs64 NetLicensing - Innovative License Management Solution
title: Labs64 NetLicensing - Innovative License Management Solution
tool_name: Labs64 NetLicensing - Innovative License Management Solution

api_list.name: Validate licensee
api_list.description: Validates active licenses of the licensee

required_parameters.name: licenseenumber
required_parameters.description: Use valid licensee number (can be obtained by calling 'Licensees list')

api_list.name: Licensees list
api_list.description: Return a list of all licensees for the current vendor
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://netlicensing.p.rapidapi.com/core/v2/rest/licensee"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "netlicensing.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://netlicensing.p.rapidapi.com/core/v2/rest/licensee"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "netlicensing.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
